data.name: Beginners Guide to Circular Economy and Evolving Sustainable Finance
data.summary: The Post Covid economy demands business models which are resilient, glocal, and have a high resource efficiency. A Circular Economy fulfils all of these AND represents a massive step in mitigating Climate change challenges. Today Sustainable Finance market worldwide is ~$32T. Learn more about the evolving sustainable finance sector, especially during the time of the pandemic. Join the webinar discussion to understand the opportunities.
data.speakers:
Pranav Khanna, Founder, Make Circular
Nishant Malhotra, Founder, Middle Road Pvt. Ltd
